snippet.title: Parallel Experiment | Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Parallel Experiment is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game that separates players on different screens, requiring communication and teamwork to solve challenging puzzles. Players are often separated, each with different clues and items, making collaboration essential for solving the game’s escape-room-style challenges.

Set in a noir-inspired world with a comic book art style, the game follows detectives Old Dog and Ally, who have become targets of the Cryptic Killer and are now unwilling participants in his twisted experiment. The gripping narrative, combined with unique NPC interactions, keeps the stakes high as players work together to stop the killer and escape his dangerous scheme.

Coming to Steam, iOS, and Android on March 6, 2025.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2012320/Parallel_Experiment/

Join us on social media:

Website: https://elevenpuzzles.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/GtmFRYU5mc
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/elevenpuzzles/
X: https://twitter.com/elevenpuzzles
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/elevenpuzzles
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@eleven_puzzles

#ParallelExperiment #PointAndClick #PuzzleAdventure #SteamNextFest #IndieGameLaunch #DetectiveDuo
